What is openSUSE Mentoring?


openSUSE is a community project to promote the use of Linux everywhere!

And we believe that the best results come from people collaborating and having fun.

This our approach to collect project ideas for programs like Google Summer of Code, Rails Girls Summer of Code or Outreachy in a centralized way.


Portus

Ruby Ruby on Rails Docker

Portus is an open source authorization service and user interface for the next generation Docker Registry.

Pick one of the projects and follow the get started instructions:

Open Build Service

Ruby Ruby on Rails Perl Linux Packaging

A generic system to build and distribute packages from sources in an automatic, consistent and reproducible way. Comprehensive, Collaborative and Open Source!

Please wait for loading the projects ...

Pick one of the projects and follow the get started instructions:

YaST

Ruby Linux

YaST is the installation and configuration tool for openSUSE and the SUSE Linux Enterprise distributions. It features an easy-to-use interface and powerful configuration capabilities.

Please wait for loading the projects ...

Pick one of the projects and follow the get started instructions:

Machinery

Ruby Linux

A command line application for creating descriptions of Linux systems and working with them. Machinery supports use cases such as configuration discovery, system validation, and service migration.

Please wait for loading the projects ...

Pick one of the projects and follow the get started instructions:

OSEM

Ruby Ruby on Rails

The Open Source Event Manager is an event management app tailored to free software conferences.
